plot: Sachiko Kokubu, the beautiful owner of a Tokyo design agency, finds her life disrupted when she receives paper scraps stitched together with piano wire with the message &"I know you were meant to marry me.&" As further messages come she embarks on a nightmare investigation to uncover the identity of her tormentor.   Written by  robotaffliction1103
title: Tokyo Psycho
plot_es: Sachiko Kokubu, the beautiful owner of a Tokyo design agency, finds her life disrupted when she receives paper scraps stitched together with piano wire with the message &"I know you were meant to marry me.&" As further messages come she embarks on a nightmare investigation to uncover the identity of her tormentor.   Written by  robotaffliction1103
original_name: Tôkyô densetsu: ugomeku machi no kyôki
